comment: Rubbish, they are feline. They are not a hybrid of a cat and dog. Where do you get your information from?
amr:

            :domain (t / they)
            :mod (r / rubbish))

            :op2 (d / dog)
            :domain (t2 / they))

            :ARG2 (a / amr-unknown)))
